cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, which types are used on <1>{{domain}}</1>, and how you can manage them.

sections.s1Body: Cookies are small text files that a website can store on your device (computer, mobile phone, or tablet) to remember information about your visit (for example, preferences, usage statistics, or technical settings).
sections.s2Body: In general, cookies can be classified by:
s2Bullets: Who manages them: first-party or third-party cookies.
How long they remain: session or persistent cookies.
Purpose: technical (necessary), personalization, analytics, advertising, etc.
sections.s3BodyRest: (non-essential) to measure and analyze site usage, in order to improve user experience and performance.
sections.s3PurposeDetails: (pages visited, visit duration, device type, etc.)
sections.s3Note: Note: The information collected by these cookies is generally aggregated or pseudonymized depending on the provider’s configuration. In any case, you can reject their installation.
sections.s4Body: The legal basis for using analytics cookies (non-essential) is <1>user consent</1>, requested via the cookie banner before installation.
sections.s5Title: 5. How to manage, withdraw, or change consent
sections.s5Body1: You can block or delete cookies from your browser settings. Please note that if you disable certain cookies, some features may not work properly.
sections.s5Body2: Also, if you accepted analytics cookies and want to withdraw your consent, you can:
s5Bullets: Clear the site’s local storage (localStorage) using your browser developer tools.
Reload the site: the banner will be shown if no preference is stored.
sections.s5Hint: (If you implement a “Cookie settings” button, you’ll be able to change your choice easily from the site itself.)
sections.s6Body: For more information about how we process personal data, see our <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

cookiesPolicy.footerNote: This Cookie Policy may be updated to reflect changes in cookie usage or legal requirements. The current version will always be available on this page.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: In compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation – GDPR), we inform you about the processing of your personal data through the website <link>{{website}}</link>.

sections.s2Body: We may collect the following data, depending on how you use the site:
s2Bullets: Name and surname (if you enter them in forms)
Browsing data (cookies, identifiers, browser, pages visited, etc.)
sections.s3Body: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
s3Bullets: Respond to inquiries sent via forms or email
Provide the requested services and manage the relationship with the user
Manage commercial communications (only if you give your consent)
Analyze website usage and improve user experience
Ensure site security and prevent fraud or misuse
sections.s4Body: The legal basis for processing is:
s4Bullets: Your consent (for example, when submitting forms or accepting non-essential cookies)
Performance of a contract or pre-contractual steps (if you request a service)
The controller’s legitimate interest (security, site improvement, and user support)
sections.s5Body: We will keep your data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected and to determine any potential liabilities arising from processing.
s5Bullets: Inquiries/contact: for the time needed to respond and close the request
Contractual relationship: for the duration of the relationship and, thereafter, for the applicable legal periods
Analytics/cookies: according to the duration indicated in the Cookie Policy and/or the provider’s settings
sections.s6Body: We do not share your data with third parties unless legally required. However, certain providers may process data on our behalf (e.g., hosting, email, analytics), acting as data processors under appropriate contracts and safeguards.
sections.s7Body: If we use providers that process data outside the European Economic Area (e.g., analytics or email services), transfers will be carried out with appropriate safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses or other mechanisms permitted by the GDPR).
sections.s8Body: You can exercise the following rights:
s8Bullets: Withdraw consent at any time (without affecting prior lawfulness)
sections.s8HowTo: To exercise them, email us at {{email}} indicating the right you wish to exercise and identifying yourself.
sections.s8Note: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection authority.
sections.s9Body: We apply reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data and prevent unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or improper disclosure.
sections.s10Body: Currently, this website does not use non-essential cookies. If analytics tools or third-party cookies are added (for example, for usage statistics), user consent will be requested in advance and this policy will be updated accordingly.
sections.s11Body: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy to adapt it to legislative changes or site updates. The current version will always be available on this page.
sections.s12Body: This website does not carry out automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal effects on the user.

hero.subtitle: We apply engineering and optimization so your organization can transform reality.

values.title: Your mission is our fuel
values.subtitle: We remove the technical and administrative burden so you can focus all your energy on what truly matters: <bold>your cause</bold>.

funding.title: Funding and innovation within reach
funding.desc: We help you secure funding and turn it into concrete operational improvements through engineering and digitalization.

resources.title: Maximizing your resources
resources.desc: We implement clear, tailored technical solutions to professionalize your management, optimizing every available resource.

endToEnd.title: End-to-end support
endToEnd.desc: We’re with you all the way: from shaping the idea to execution, fundraising, and measuring results.

process.title: How we work
process.subtitle: Our end-to-end methodology ensures every step aligns with your goals and maximizes funding and sustainability opportunities.

s1.title: Analysis and planning
s1.desc: We understand your idea, assess its feasibility, and design a solid, fundable project plan.

s2.title: Optimization and digitalization
s2.desc: We apply engineering to improve processes, digitize tasks, and make operations more efficient.

s3.title: Funding acquisition
s3.desc: We identify calls, prepare winning proposals, and connect you with funding opportunities.

s4.title: Execution and evaluation
s4.desc: We support implementation and measure impact to ensure sustainable results.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
philosophy.intro: We know what it takes to sustain a social project: the passion, the dedication, the endless hours—and also the feeling that sometimes resources or support are missing. We want to support you, remove your technical burden, and help you focus on what’s essential: continuing to create real impact.

commitment.title: Our commitment to you
commitment.desc: We join your cause as an ally who understands your challenges. We turn your ideas into sustainable projects and support you every step of the way, so your team can focus on what they do best: creating opportunities and transforming lives.

dream.title: The change we dream of
dream.desc: We want a stronger social ecosystem where every organization has access to the tools, funding, and knowledge it needs to grow without losing its essence. We dream of a sector where collaboration is the norm and no one is left behind due to lack of support.

reasons.title: Why choose us?
items: Commitment to social impact: your mission is ours too.
Clarity and closeness: we speak plainly and move at your pace.
Transparency and trust: we work ethically and communicate honestly.
Practical innovation: we turn complex processes into easy-to-use solutions.
Collaboration and empowerment: we share knowledge so you gain autonomy.

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: We are engineering and management professionals, passionate about applying our knowledge to create real social impact.
